Dialogue.Page: Hey! Welcome to the party! I'm Trifid, nice to meet you!
I'm glad to see New Horizons and Real Solar System getting some more recognition, makes me proud!
Be sure to look out for Real Solar System, which is a mod that I'm currently working on!
I go by "Trifid" on the Outer Wilds modding discord, feel free to stop by and chat!
